What is Honor Protocol ?

Honor Protocol will be the world's first global decentralized cryptocurrency market platform that only ensures the world's first based DeFi project platform. This service will be a gateway to more than 500 million users worldwide to sending, receiving, spending and access to a more secure based DeFi project based cryptocurrency.

Honor Protocol based DeFi project that will be driven alongside the communities built on the Binance Smart Chain #BSC and will support collaboration over time with major blockchain. Honor Protocol will bring the most revolutionary mechanisms to the ecosystem such as capita gain, staking / dividend, governance platform, education center, marketplace, visual development and various ecosystem development in the future as long as it complies with based DeFi project.
